name: Hamburg

hero_dishes.name: Labskaus
hero_dishes.description: Hamburg's signature sailor's dish made with potatoes, corned beef or salted meat, beets, and onions, typically served with a fried egg, pickles, and pickled herring fillets
hero_dishes.origin_story: Originated in the 16th century as a meal for sailors who were out at sea for a long time. It's cooked from long-lasting ingredients that wouldn't spoil on extended voyages, creating a unique pink-colored hash that's deeply ingrained in Hamburg's maritime culinary history.
hero_dishes.where_to_find: Old Commercial Room restaurant in St Pauli serves the best Labskausâ€”this is THE place to 'get' Hamburg's port culture

signature_drinks.name: Alsterwasser
signature_drinks.description: Refreshing shandy-style drink made by mixing equal parts beer and lemon sodaâ€”light, fizzy, and slightly sweet, named after the city's Alster river
signature_drinks.how_locals_drink_it: A favorite among Hamburgers, especially during warm summer months by the Alster lakes. Called 'Radler' in other parts of Germany, but in Hamburg, it's Alsterwasser.

signature_drinks.name: Astra Beer
signature_drinks.description: Hamburg's iconic local Pils with the motto 'Astra. Was dagegen?' (Astra. Got a problem with that?). Market leader alongside Holsten, representing St. Pauli football club culture
signature_drinks.how_locals_drink_it: Drunk by St. Pauli supporters (while Holsten is for HSV fans). The ASTRA brewery pub serves craft beers, tapas, and offers brewing seminars. Astra likes to swim against the current and shows this self-confidently.

signature_drinks.name: Ratsherrn Craft Beer
signature_drinks.description: Modern craft brewery from 2012 in the trendy Sternschanze district, influenced by Hamburg tradition and modern inspiration from US, Denmark, and Italy
signature_drinks.how_locals_drink_it: Enjoyed at Altes MÃ¤dchen Ratsherrn Braugasthaus, a charming country-style alehouse serving craft beers with sophisticated seasonal dishes and homemade bread. Hamburg's craft beer movement has been breathing new life into brewing since 2013.

signature_drinks.name: Senatsbock
signature_drinks.description: Traditional strong beer brewed annually between 1950s-1970s, revived in 2015 as a collaborative project between nine Hamburg breweries
